doc.field: Kenosha County : The south-easternmost county in Wisconsin. The eastern portion is sometimes considered part of greater Chicagoland. Lake County : The north-westernmost county in Indiana. The eastern portions of the County are often considered portions of Chicagoland. McHenry County : Northwest of Cook County and sharing much of its border with Wisconsin, this Illinois county is often considered part of Chicagoland due to its many connections (including rail and highway).
